customer_review: This works great for my 20 lb terrier mix. The leash is long enough to ive him some room to roam but still keep him close. The clasps are bigger than his leashes but not too heavy for him. I've used while traveling and shopping, works great!
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: For such a low price, I was impressed by the quality of this product! I just had surgery and have limited use of my arms for the next few weeks - this leash lets me walk my 40lb pit who pulls like no other. Easy to use. I'm thrilled!
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review:
The leash is way too short and coiled way too tight to be useful! Attached it to my waist (I’m 5’4) my dogs couldn’t move to my sides because the leashes were too tight and the loops were in the front (causing me to literally walk over them when attempting to use this) 



Gave this two stars because I use the belt still, but with different leashes and to carry other things. Super useful if you’re thrifty!
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: Love this hands free leash! It makes running and walking so much easier!
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: I have a lab/Shepard/husky mix and a few black labs who are close to 100 lbs I walk daily, and they pull like crazy! This eliminates my shoulder pain and it keeps them from tearing my arm off! Love it! Great price too can't beat it. I didn't receive a pouch though like other reviews describe.
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: I recommended this for my golden retriever who weighs 70 pounds and this is so good to go to the besch and stuff
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: It is not long enough and it is too heavy for a 30 lb dog.
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: We use this leash all of the time. I definitely recommend this belt/leash.
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt

customer_review: This is not good for a small dog, the leash is heavier than her.  I recommend making a version that has a lighter clasp as well as lighter material.
product_name: Sassy Dog Wear Hands Free Dog Leash Belt
